title: Fine-tuning LLMs: Best Practices
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to customizing language models
content:
LLM Fine-tuning

Learn how to adapt pre-trained models to your specific use case.

When to Fine-tune

Fine-tuning is ideal when you need specialized knowledge or specific output formats.

Techniques

Explore methods like full fine-tuning, LoRA, and prompt tuning.

Best Practices

Prepare quality data, monitor for overfitting, and evaluate thoroughly.
